fullName.description: Full display name for the organization.

logoId.description: Logo image identifier for the organization.

logoUrl.description: Full URL to the organization logo image.

memberId.description: Member numeric identifier for the requesting user within this organization.

memberRole.description: Organization role of the requesting user. Accepts `owner`, `admin`, `maintain`, or `view`. See [Organization user roles](https://docs.seqera.io/platform-cloud/orgs-and-teams/roles#organization-user-roles) for more information.
memberRole.title: OrgRole

items.description: Organization database object containing full organization details including metadata, subscription status, and member role information.
items.title: OrganizationDbDto

organizations.description: Array of organizations to which the requesting user belongs.

schema.description: Response containing organizations accessible to the authenticated user.
schema.title: ListOrganizationsResponse
